pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

sentences.english: Promotes the desired work culture around the Winning Ways of the IHG Hotels Group and the brand ethos.
sentences.chinese: 围绕洲际酒店集团的致胜之道的企业文化和品牌理念。

sentences.english: India has successfully launched a long-range intercontinental ballistic missile able to carry a nuclear warhead, officials say.
sentences.chinese: 印度成功发射一枚可以携带核弹头的洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: 2001 end of the year, Bayern Munich also won the Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 2001年底，拜仁慕尼黑还赢得了洲际杯冠军。

sentences.english: Creating a transcontinental wireless operator seems to make sense.
sentences.chinese: 创造洲际无线运营商好像是有意义的。

sentences.english: InterContinental is working with start-up company Topguest.
sentences.chinese: 洲际酒店集团正与创业型公司Topguest合作。

sentences.english: This allows the reader to differentiate between theater and intercontinental assets with ease.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以让读者方便地区分战区导弹与洲际导弹。

sentences.english: China to unveil new nuclear-capable intercontinental missiles on National Day.
sentences.chinese: 阅兵典礼将展示中国新型核武洲际导弹。

sentences.english: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: My first objective is the Intercontinental Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我的首要目标是洲际杯。

sentences.english: Club InterContinental located on the 46th floor has a panoramic view of the city.
sentences.chinese: 洲际俱乐部位于酒店46层，可坐享滨城全线海景。

sentences.english: Eisenhower secretly ordered the Pentagon to build ICBMs with "maximum urgency."
sentences.chinese: 艾森豪威尔秘密命令五角大楼集中全力研发洲际导弹。

sentences.english: The submarines equipped with intercontinental ballistic missiles, and anti-ship and anti-submarine torpedoes.
sentences.chinese: 该潜艇装备洲际弹道导弹以及反潜与反舰鱼雷。

sentences.english: Air Force One as the hidden ICBM of the United States of America (which can actually be a cool idea in a campiagn IMO).
sentences.chinese: 空军一号原来是美国的极秘洲际导弹？

sentences.english: At the curve in the road where his cab had caught fire, the interstate was streaked with black ash.
sentences.chinese: 在他的卡车着火的弯道，洲际公路上都是黑灰。

sentences.english: Some of the runners began talking about "continent bagging". Only six more to go....
sentences.chinese: 有些选手已经开始谈论洲际长跑，但只有六个人想去。

sentences.english: The russians first fielded an intercontinental ballistic missile .
sentences.chinese: 俄国人首先发射了洲际弹道导弹。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
